name: Hero of Flag - World Flags
description:
How many national flags do you recognise? Are you familiar with the names and flags of countries all over the world? Hero of Flag is a quiz game with full of fun that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of countries or regions flags from around the world.

Train yourself and challenge yourself by trying to beat your local best score. Challenge your friends or parents. Prove your friends or parents you are the best. Compare you best scores to those on the global leaderboard. How are you doing against the rest of world?

Nine level packs with over 250 flags of countries or regions - ALL FREE.

Enjoy!
